hero.middle: Founder of the Republic of Turkey
hero.bottom: He is a great soldier, politician and statesman who fit 11 wars, 24 medals, 7 decorations, 13 books, 1 country and millions of free people into his 57-year life. With love, respect, gratitude and longing...

words.text: My humble body will one day become soil, but the Republic of Turkey will live on forever.
